name: Retrotron
description: Retrotron is an oscilloscope-themed robot with a nostalgic touch. Equipped with a vintage retro console, its arms and legs are made from sturdy foundry materials. Its screen displays a classic game of Snake, adding a playful element to its design. To complete the look, Retrotron sports a stylish pair of shades. This unique robot is an esteemed member of the WebtrES club.
